game.name: PuzzleTwist
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Leaderboards, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 《퍼즐트위스트》는 레저와 전략이 균형을 이루는 게임입니다. 특정 조작 방법으로 퍼즐을 복원하는 방식이며, 회전 모드와 뒤집기 모드로 나뉘고 다양한 난이도 레벨을 갖추고 있습니다. 공간 사고 능력과 논리 분석 능력을 시험하는 혁신적인 퍼즐 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "PuzzleTwist" is a game balancing casual fun and strategy. Its gameplay involves restoring puzzles through specific operations, divided into Rotation Mode and Flip Mode with multiple difficulty levels. It’s an innovative puzzle game that tests spatial thinking and logical analysis skills.
